ISH - International science hub

Decentralized scientific platform that is aimed at increasing the availability, quality and speed of scientific developments by creating a bridge between the specialist and the customer.

Platform

The ISH platform "International Science Hub"​ is a decentralized scientific platform that is aimed at increasing availability, quality, and speed of scientific developments by creating a bridge between specialists and the customers. The purpose of the ISH is to create a working environment that will unite scientists. Science as information - should be accessible to everyone. Platform users will be provided with all the necessary functionality to handle the most complex and time-consuming projects, and close integration with existing project management solutions and in the market will ensure a low entry threshold, without the need to master new tools. Specialists will have the better opportunity to realize their potential. They will be able to easily find customers and attract the necessary investments to conduct research and obtain new scientific results. Specialists will be able to publish their work in a personal portfolio such as a research, development or the results of participation in conferences. Customers will get the opportunity to form a team of specialists of any level of training in the shortest terms, relying on the rank-reputation system. And the platform functionality and project management under the supervision of supervisors will help to distribute the available financial and human resources competently, focusing on the product. At the moment, there is a technology blockade in the world. Exactly, these decentralized tools that will help bring new players and new ideas to the global market, in general, greatly accelerating scientific and technological progress.

Roadmap

  • June 2018

    PRESALE of the tokens

  • 4 Quarter 2018

    Start of the open round of ICO

  • 4 Quarter 2018

    Beta Test of ISH Platform

  • 1 Quarter 2019

    List Science Token (ST) to the exchange

  • 1-3 Quarter 2019

    Formation of an international legal support service

  • 2-3 Quarter 2019

    Development of a transnational intellectual property

  • 3-4 Quarter 2019

    ISH Platform release

  • 2020

    Opening of the international campus

  • 2022

    Construction of an international scientific complex

Founders

  • Denis Zyryanov

    CEO, Founder

    Observing the development of technology, as well as implementing my own projects, I discovered many problems of interaction between business and the scientific community. I decided to fix it!

    For many months, I and my team have been working on creating a platform model that can unite science and business, and save them from unnecessary formalities. The model offers a solution to many problems that stand in the way of scientific and technological progress! The idea of ​​its implementation formed the basis of the International Science Hub (ISH).

    ISH is able to unite those people who are engaged in the development of science and technology, provide them with a comfortable environment with the necessary functionality and legal support.

    And being a transboundary solution, ISH will help to get away from the senseless race of technology.

    Making this step, we will approach the hidden secrets of the world by one more step!

    Telegram LinkedIn

  • Nikita Paplavskiy

    Founder

    In the course of scientific practice, I faced against the problem of the lack of specialists for solving a number of problems. Then I started thinking about creating an outsourcing technology to solve scientific and applied problems. In the course of long work on this concept, the ISH platform was designed to simplify the search for required specialists and conduct research work. The system of distributed studies will accelerate the solution of scientifically oriented problems and, accordingly, will accelerate scientific and technical progress.

    I believe that in the age of digital technologies a person should not face the problem of a local shortage of specialists, resources and sources of information. That's why we decided to create ISH.

    Telegram LinkedIn

  • Dmitrii Poliakov

    CKO (Chief Knowledge Officer)

    Working in the field of IT for more than 15 years, constantly expanding my knowledge and gaining new experience, I have repeatedly experienced a shortage of specialists with a sufficient amount of fundamental knowledge. All attempts to organize a team of such specialists stumbled over the same problem - state boundaries and regulations. Working through this task once again, I’ve met with the ISH team. They offered a simple and effective solution.

    Having studied the concept of ISH, I did not hesitate to make a decision to become part of the team. Possessing sufficient competence and many years of experience at the intersection of business and IT, I was able to qualitatively improve the level of development of ISH technical and legal solutions.

    Now we are faced with the issue of implementing and developing the platform. This is a foreseeable and achievable task. And its results are capable of qualitatively transforming the scientific world and the world of technology.

    Telegram LinkedIn
